messages.subject: Re: Intro and In Home Conference
messages.msgSnippet: ~~We are in your sessions, not sure if they ll be enormous groups or nice roundtable size, but we ll try to make sure we introduce ourselves.~~ I actually got
messages.messageBody:
~~We are in your sessions, not sure if they'll
be enormous groups or nice roundtable size, but we'll try to make
sure we introduce ourselves.~~

I actually got a sheet in the mail today, stating the session sizes
(who is this organized??). It looked like most had around 70 people
with a range of 50-80 at the high and low end. Please make sure you
say "hey!".:)

Ren
learninginfreedom.com

messages.subject: Re: Intro and In Home Conference
messages.msgSnippet: ... you there. ... grew up there. ... I ll be wearing my blue unschoolers winter waterpark sweatshirt on Friday, so hopefully I ll be easy to find. My hubby
messages.messageBody:
--- Kelly Shultz <kashultz@...> wrote:
>
> We will be getting in tomorrow afternoon, .... so hopefully we'll see
you there.
>
> I will have to hear more about where you are from in Ohio Carol, as I
grew up there.
>
>>>>>>>>>>>>>

I'll be wearing my blue unschoolers winter waterpark sweatshirt on
Friday, so hopefully I'll be easy to find.

My hubby and I grew up in Fostoria, ( small town about an hour south of
Toledo) and now live in Sandusky.

Hope to see you in Chicago!

Carol

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Intro and In Home Conference
messages.msgSnippet: Purplish hair, check.  We are in your sessions, not sure if they ll be enormous groups or nice roundtable size, but we ll try to make sure we introduce
messages.messageBody:
Purplish hair, check. We are in your sessions, not sure if they'll
be enormous groups or nice roundtable size, but we'll try to make
sure we introduce ourselves.

I hope you do get a chance to do belly dancing with Lori, she is one
of our really cool local unschoolers.

Kelly

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Intro and In Home Conference - seeing Ren
messages.msgSnippet: We will be getting in tomorrow afternoon, and will probably spend a bit of time at the pool, so can probably be located there. Otherwise, I think my husband
messages.messageBody:
We will be getting in tomorrow afternoon, and will probably spend a
bit of time at the pool, so can probably be located there.
Otherwise, I think my husband and I are both registered for all of
Ren's sessions, so hopefully we'll see you there.

I will have to hear more about where you are from in Ohio Carol, as I
grew up there.

Kelly

messages.subject: Re: Intro and In Home Conference - seeing Ren
messages.msgSnippet: ~~Had I known Ren would be there, I would have made plans much earlier.~~ Aw shucks *blushes*.;) I m honored. Looking forward to meeting everyone and maybe
messages.messageBody:
~~Had
I known Ren would be there, I would have made plans much earlier.~~

Aw shucks *blushes*.;)

I'm honored. Looking forward to meeting everyone and maybe finding my
way to the belly dancing class. Now to sort through that stack of
notes I've largely ignored for far too long....

Ren
learninginfreedom.com

messages.subject: Re: Intro and In Home Conference - seeing Ren
messages.msgSnippet: ...  wrote: I am absolutely thrilled to be seeing Ren this weekend. We will  be at the In Home Conference
messages.messageBody:
> > > > >--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, Kelly Shultz
<kashultz@...> wrote:

I am absolutely thrilled to be seeing Ren this weekend. We will be at
the In Home Conference < < < < <

I'll be there, too!

Just decided this weekend to drive there from Ohio, after reading Ren's
post on Sat., where she mentioned she'd be in Chicago. I had been to
one of these In Home Conferencees before and was thus on their mailing
list but never looked at my flier to see who the presenters were. Had
I known Ren would be there, I would have made plans much earlier.

Carol R.

messages.subject: Intro and In Home Conference
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, My name is Kelly Shultz, and I am mom to 3 in Chicago.  I ve been on the list for a while, but just wanted to introduce myself and say that I am
messages.messageBody:
Hello,

My name is Kelly Shultz, and I am mom to 3 in Chicago. I've been on
the list for a while, but just wanted to introduce myself and say
that I am absolutely thrilled to be seeing Ren this weekend. We will
be at the In Home Conference, myself, my husband Craig, and our three
children (as well as my mil), so if there are any others on this list
that are coming, please look us up.

Kelly
